languages.text: {n}Зажмурившись, арбитр тихо произносит со странным облегчением:{/n} "Ну и ладно. Буду вашим храбрым рыцарем, раз вам так угодно".
{n}Closing his eyes briefly, Solomorne quietly says, with a strange note of relief,{/n} "Fine, then. I'll be your valiant knight, if it pleases you."
languages.original_text: {n}Зажмурившись, арбитр тихо произносит со странным облегчением:{/n} "Ну и ладно. Буду вашим храбрым рыцарем, раз вам так угодно".

traits.locale_text: {n}Closing his eyes briefly, Solomorne quietly says, with a strange note of relief,{/n} "Fine, then. I'll be your valiant knight, if it pleases you."
{n}Closing his eyes briefly, Solomorne quietly says, with a strange note of relief,{/n} "Fine, then. I'll be your valiant knight, if it pleases you."
{n}Closing his eyes briefly, Solomorne quietly says, with a strange note of relief,{/n} "Fine, then. I'll be your valiant knight, if it pleases you."
{n}Closing his eyes briefly, Solomorne quietly says, with a strange note of relief,{/n} "Fine, then. I'll be your valiant knight, if it pleases you."
{n}Closing his eyes briefly, Solomorne quietly says, with a strange note of relief,{/n} "Fine, then. I'll be your valiant knight, if it pleases you."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne ferme les yeux un instant, puis répond à mi-voix avec un certain soulagement :{/n} « Bon, très bien. Je serai votre preux chevalier, si vous y tenez. »
languages.original_text: {n}Closing his eyes briefly, Solomorne quietly says, with a strange note of relief,{/n} "Fine, then. I'll be your valiant knight, if it pleases you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne ferme les yeux un instant, puis répond à mi-voix avec un certain soulagement :{/n} « Bon, très bien. Je serai votre preux chevalier, si vous y tenez. »

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンはそっと目を閉じ、どこか安堵の混じった声で静かに言った。{/n}「わかりました。あなたが望むなら、勇敢な騎士になってみせましょう」
languages.original_text: {n}Closing his eyes briefly, Solomorne quietly says, with a strange note of relief,{/n} "Fine, then. I'll be your valiant knight, if it pleases you."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンはそっと目を閉じ、どこか安堵の混じった声で静かに言った。{/n}「わかりました。あなたが望むなら、勇敢な騎士になってみせましょう」

languages.text: {n}Cerrando los ojos por un instante, Solomorne responde con un curioso tono de alivio:{/n} «Muy bien. Si esto le satisface, seré su valeroso caballero».
languages.original_text: {n}Closing his eyes briefly, Solomorne quietly says, with a strange note of relief,{/n} "Fine, then. I'll be your valiant knight, if it pleases you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cerrando los ojos por un instante, Solomorne responde con un curioso tono de alivio:{/n} «Muy bien. Si esto le satisface, seré su valeroso caballero».

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙闭上眼睛片刻，随后平静地开了口，语气中带着古怪的宽慰之意。{/n}“好吧，如果你愿意的话，我愿意做你英勇的骑士。”
languages.original_text: {n}Closing his eyes briefly, Solomorne quietly says, with a strange note of relief,{/n} "Fine, then. I'll be your valiant knight, if it pleases you."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙闭上眼睛片刻，随后平静地开了口，语气中带着古怪的宽慰之意。{/n}“好吧，如果你愿意的话，我愿意做你英勇的骑士。”

languages.text: {n}Gözlerini kısa bir süre kapattıktan sonra bir nebze rahatlayan Solomorne, usulca mırıldanıyor.{/n} "Peki madem. Hoşunuza gidiyorsa cesur şövalyeniz de olurum."
languages.original_text: {n}Closing his eyes briefly, Solomorne quietly says, with a strange note of relief,{/n} "Fine, then. I'll be your valiant knight, if it pleases you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Gözlerini kısa bir süre kapattıktan sonra bir nebze rahatlayan Solomorne, usulca mırıldanıyor.{/n} "Peki madem. Hoşunuza gidiyorsa cesur şövalyeniz de olurum."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne schließt kurz die Augen und sagt seltsam erleichtert: {/n} "Also schön. Dann werde ich eben Euer tapferer Ritter sein."
languages.original_text: {n}Closing his eyes briefly, Solomorne quietly says, with a strange note of relief,{/n} "Fine, then. I'll be your valiant knight, if it pleases you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne schließt kurz die Augen und sagt seltsam erleichtert: {/n} "Also schön. Dann werde ich eben Euer tapferer Ritter sein."
